source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_000<tab>We're very close to devising a way to further augment your magia board. If you call again in a while, I should be able to offer you the benefits.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_000<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良に、目処がつきました！
いまはその準備中でして、
またしばらくしてから来てください。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_Q1_000_000<tab>What would you like to do?
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_Q1_000_000<tab>何をする？

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A1_000_001<tab>Further augment your magia board.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A1_000_001<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A1_000_002<tab>Ask about further augmentation.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A1_000_002<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良について聞く

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A1_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_010<tab>I should be happy to further augment your magia board, should you have the requisite materials in your possession. Do you...?
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_010<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良ですか？
素材が必要となりますが……。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_020<tab>Alas, it seems that you do not. A thousand pardons, but since I have no stock myself, I cannot assist you at this time.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_020<tab>おや、どうやら素材が揃っていないご様子。
改良には絶対に必要なものですので、
申し訳ありませんが、先に集めてきていただけますか？

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>In order to further augment your magia board, you must possess <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F10202 /var>, <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F20202 /var>, and <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F30202 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良には「<var 28 ((Item)) F260F101 /var>」、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F260F201 /var>」、「<var 28 ((Item)) F260F301 /var>」が、
1個ずつ必要になります。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_030<tab>Oh, so you do. Though, if I am to begin, you will of course need to give them over to me, if you would be so kind...
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_030<tab>どうやら、すべて揃っているようですね。
では、素材をお渡しいただけますか？

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_031<tab>Very good, very good. Now then, if you'll hand me your magia board, I'll get started right away. Rest assured this will only take a moment...
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_031<tab>……確かに、素材をお預かりします。
では、マギアボードもお預かりして、改良しますね。
完成まで、少々お待ちください。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_032<tab>'Tis done! I present to you your magia board, along with a seventh magicite, which you may now affix to it if you so desire.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_032<tab>無事に改良が成功しました！
7つ目の魔晶石をお渡ししますので、
「マギアメルダー」で組み込んでみてください。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_033<tab>Do bear in mind, however, that you may still only use up to five magicite to strengthen your affinity with a given element.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_033<tab>ご存知だと思いますが、組み込める魔晶石は、
ひとつの属性につき、最大で5つまで。
使用の際は、くれぐれもご注意くださいね。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you ask about?
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_Q2_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_001<tab>Further magia board augmentation.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_001<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良について

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_002<tab>Required materials.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_002<tab>必要な素材について

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_003<tab>Affixing a seventh magicite.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_003<tab>7つ目の魔晶石について

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_004<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_A2_000_004<tab>戻る

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_040<tab>We've devised a simple method by which an additional seventh magicite can be safely affixed to your magia board. Surely I needn't explain the advantages of being able to do so!
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_040<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良で、
最大7個まで魔晶石を組み込めるようになります。
改良に合わせて7つ目をお渡しするので、活用してください！

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Through further magia board augmentation, you can increase the maximum number of magicite which can be affixed to it.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良を行うことで、
組み込める魔晶石の数がひとつ増えます。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_100_041<tab>Having your magia board first augmented in <var 28 ((ContentFinderCondition)) E8022A /var> is not a prerequisite.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_100_041<tab>なお、マギアボードのさらなる改良は、
「<var 28 ((ContentFinderCondition)) E8022A /var>」で、
マギアボードの改良を行っていなくとも、行うことができます。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_050<tab>The augmentation procedure is not terribly difficult in of itself, but it does require a number of resources that I do not have at present. I'm afraid you'll have to go and procure them yourself.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_050<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良には、
やはりそれ相応の素材が必要でして……。
条件に合うものを、探してきていただけますか？

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>In order to further augment your magia board, you must possess <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F10202 /var>, <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F20202 /var>, and <var 31 ((Item)) 02F260F30202 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良には「<var 28 ((Item)) F260F101 /var>」、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F260F201 /var>」、「<var 28 ((Item)) F260F301 /var>」が、
1個ずつ必要になります。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_060<tab>I have an extra magicite I can give to you once I've finished augmenting your magia board. Similarly to the previous stone I supplied, it has been specially treated and is no different from the others you use in conjunction with your board.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_060<tab>7つ目としてお渡しする予定の魔晶石は、
6つ目と同じく、魔晶片に専用の調整を施した特殊なものです。
当然、性能に関しては通常のものと変わらないので、ご安心を。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>The seventh magicite that you may affix to an augmented magia board is functionally the same as the other six and confers no additional benefits.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>マギアボードのさらなる改良によって追加される魔晶石は、
他の魔晶石と区別されず、
属性値の強化による効果も変わりません。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>However, due to the design of the magia board, you may use no more than five to strengthen your affinity with a given element.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>ただし、属性値を強化するために組み込める魔晶石は、
ひとつの属性につき、最大で5つまでとなります。

source:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_070<tab>Through innovation and ingenuity, we will strive to make even further augmentation possible!
...Or not. Alas, we may have reached the limits of the magia board.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_000_070<tab>マギアボードをもっと改良して、
8つ目の魔晶石を組み込めるようにする！
……のは、無理そうなんですよね、残念です。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_100_070<tab>Oh? It appears your magia board still has room for improvement. You can augment it with the materials found in Pyros, should you be so inclined.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_ENG00465_100_070<tab>おや、ピューロス帯の素材による、
マギアボードの改良を行っていないようですね。
もしよろしければ、そちらもお試しください！

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_TALK_ACTOR<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA4SUBSPHEREGUIDE_00561_TALK_ACTOR<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
